itemLabel: John Erskine, 1st Baron Erskine of Rerrick

wikipedia_page.main: John Maxwell Erskine, 1st Baron Erskine of Rerrick,  (14 December 1893 – 14 December 1980) was a Scottish banker. He acted as Governor of Northern Ireland from 1964 to 1968.

response: * John Erskine, 1st Baron Erskine of Rerrick.
